data.message: Look at all the angry white people 😂😂😂 he really don't care for y'all and y'all probably gone cry and go listen to Stan instead of unfollowing his page

Im not blind and i see that (also in Poland) old elite governors cannot give back power to the winners of election.  Its funny for me, because in Poland we got same situation... Everybody blame the goverment now, because ppl choose different, (prob.) non-corrupt option. I was the Eminem fan from childhood.. Do not get me wrong, I'm not with Trump or Hilary, but Trump is the better option.
